name: Toony's Amazing Game
description:
Toony The Tuna!!!!

Has his very own video game right here on X-Station. This is
a fan made game about the show "Toon in with me" and "Svengoolie"
This is also a pac-man clone game. The player is Toony the Tuna
and the goal is to eat all the donuts to clear the maze. But
watch out for the Kerwyn's otherwise they will get you. Eat the
power donuts to turn the Kerwyn's into red chickens and eat them
to score bonus points.
The game can be played with a Controller or a keyboard.
